sourcesContent:
import UserAPI from './users';

export default UserAPI

value.code:
"use strict"; Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true }); exports.templateHtml = void 0; var templateHtml = " New Template

Welcome to the Stripo demo template!

Use Drag-n-Drop and HTML email editors: two builders in one.

Stripes — Go beyond the boundaries

Whether you need to make an email background, expand a banner, or highlight the content, just set stripe color.

Structure — Build your email basis

The structure is the bar area where you post content. Use a ready-made structure or create your own directly in the settings.

Blocks — Fill out an email with content

Basic blocks like Text, Button, etc., and interactive ones, like Timer, AMP carousel, AMP accordion, and AMP form are at your service.

How can you possibly use blocks

Add product name

Write an attractive description.

Include price

BUILD

Add product name

Write an attractive description.

Include price

BUILD

Show products from all angles using the rollover effect

Create a banner directly in the email
TRY IT OUT

Place educational and fun videos from Vimeo and YouTube

Add social media icons to contact information in the footer

Besides, using both email and social marketing significantly increases CTR.

Modules — Automate routine processes

Use modules (content elements designed by us or you) to reduce repetitive work. Simply drag the necessary ones from the Modules to your template.

ESP Integration — Let the world see results of your work

Export your email with just 1 click to 40+ world-famous ESP, including Mailchimp, SendGrid, Salesforce MС, and many more. Plus you can save it as an HTML or PDF file, or export as AMP HTML.

Stripo is more than just a builder. It's an email design platform.
TRY IT OUT
"; exports.templateHtml = templateHtml; //# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,

sourcesContent:
export const templateHtml = ` New Template

Welcome to the Stripo demo template!

Use Drag-n-Drop and HTML email editors: two builders in one.

Stripes — Go beyond the boundaries

Whether you need to make an email background, expand a banner, or highlight the content, just set stripe color.

Structure — Build your email basis

The structure is the bar area where you post content. Use a ready-made structure or create your own directly in the settings.

Blocks — Fill out an email with content

Basic blocks like Text, Button, etc., and interactive ones, like Timer, AMP carousel, AMP accordion, and AMP form are at your service.

How can you possibly use blocks

Add product name

Write an attractive description.

Include price

BUILD

Add product name

Write an attractive description.

Include price

BUILD

Show products from all angles using the rollover effect

Create a banner directly in the email
TRY IT OUT

Place educational and fun videos from Vimeo and YouTube

Add social media icons to contact information in the footer

Besides, using both email and social marketing significantly increases CTR.

Modules — Automate routine processes

Use modules (content elements designed by us or you) to reduce repetitive work. Simply drag the necessary ones from the Modules to your template.

ESP Integration — Let the world see results of your work

Export your email with just 1 click to 40+ world-famous ESP, including Mailchimp, SendGrid, Salesforce MС, and many more. Plus you can save it as an HTML or PDF file, or export as AMP HTML.

Stripo is more than just a builder. It's an email design platform.
TRY IT OUT
`
